title: Summon Eyeballs
data:
{{version028}}
{{flavour|Summons multiple floating eyeballs that may be able to paralyse, drain, confuse, mutate or disintegrate.}}

'''Summon Eyeballs''' is a monster-only spell which summons several of the following [[list of eyeballs|eyeball]]-type monsters into existence<ref>{{source ref|0.28.0|mon-cast.cc|6026}}</ref>:
*{{monsterlink|Floating eye}} (43%)
*{{monsterlink|Golden eye}} (26%)
*{{monsterlink|Shining eye}} (18%)
*{{monsterlink|Great orb of eyes}} (9%)
*{{monsterlink|Eye of devastation}} (4%)

This spell is especially harmful as a player simply cannot easily protect against the wide variety of unique, unpleasant abilities these monsters possess all at once, and should kill the summoner as quickly as possible to unsummon these enemies.

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], the spell could summon [[eyes of draining]].
